column1: My husband and I have just had our trip of a lifetime to Australia cancelled for September this year
column2: so we’re looking at Croatia for an awesome alternative!We’re really struggling to find any clear information to advice IF we can actually travel there though?! Can you help?We’ve found great flights & accommodation.Thank You so much

column1: Keep checking the Foreign office travel advice:-https:/…croatiaThe Foreign & Commonwealth Office currently advises British nationals against all but essential international travel. This advice is being kept under constant review so may change soon.
